data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Craig is incredibly sensitive. If ____ has ____ watching a sad ____, ____ is ____ to ____ crying. He ____ after ____ mother ____ way, she ____ also ____ distressed. One has to be careful what one says to Craig, he could get upset!
data.partBlankContent: Craig is incredibly sensitive. If h_ has be__ watching a sad mo___, h_ is su__ to b_ crying. He ta___ after h__ mother th__ way, she i_ also eas___ distressed. One has to be careful what one says to Craig, he could get upset!
data.answer: 克雷格非常敏感。如果他一直在看一部悲伤的电影，他肯定会哭的。他很像他的母亲，她也很容易伤心。对克雷格说的话一定要小心，他会生气的!
